name: LanceDB
headline: Open-source, serverless vectordb for production-scale generative AI
description: LanceDB is a new open-source vector database that can support low-latency billion-scale vector search on a single node. Built around a new columnar data format, LanceDB makes it incredibly easy to build applications for generative AI, recsys, search engines, content moderation, and more.

founders.name: Chang She, Founder
founders.description: My passion is building tools to make teams more productive working with data. I was VP of Eng at TubiTV where I designed the ML stack and the experiment platform, in addition to growing the team by more than 3x. Previously I was CTO/co-founder of DataPad and the second major contributor to the pandas library. In a former life, I was a financial quant with stints at AQR and Barclays.

founders.name: Lei Xu, Founder
founders.description:
Lead in Machine Learning Platform in Cruise.
Apache Hadoop HDFS PMC member and Senior Software Engineer at Cloudera.
PhD in distributed storage system.

![](https://lancedb.com/images/logo-rerun.svg)
LanceDB is a developer-friendly, open source database for AI. From hyper scalable vector search and advanced retrieval for RAG, to streaming training data and interactive exploration of large scale AI datasets, LanceDB is the best foundation for your AI application
[üëÄLanceDB Cloud private betaRequest Early Access](https://lancedb.com/<https:/notionforms.io/forms/lancedb-mailing-list-cloud-kty1o5>)
[LanceDB Open Source![link-arrow](https://lancedb.com/images/link-arrow.svg)](https://lancedb.com/<https:/lancedb.github.io/lancedb/>)
The easiest way to manage AI data, from experiment to production
Installs in seconds and fits seamlessly into your existing data and AI toolchain. An embedded database (think SQLite or DuckDB) with native object storage integration, LanceDB can be deployed anywhere and easily scales to zero when not in use.
‚ÄúMidjourney generates breathtaking imagery for millions of users worldwide. Vector search is critical infrastructure that allows us to better serve our users. We evaluated multiple solutions and LanceDB was the only one that could meet the high-traffic and large scale requirements we had. We couldn't be happier with our decision.‚Äù
![hex-logo](https://lancedb.com/images/logo-mj.svg)
Nadia Ali
CFO
![](https://lancedb.com/images/mj-vectordb.png)![](https://lancedb.com/images/mj-vectordb.png)
Performant, scalable, multimodal
From rapid prototyping to hyper scale production, LanceDB delivers blazing fast performance for search, analytics, and training for multimodal AI data.
Blazing Fast Performance
![icon](https://lancedb.com/images/icon-gauge.svg)
Search billions vectors in real-time, on just a laptop.
Cost Effective Scalability
![icon](https://lancedb.com/images/icon-foursquare.svg)
Leading AI companies have indexed billions of vectors and petabytes of text, images, and videos, at a fraction of the cost of other vector databases.
Multimodal Training
![icon](https://lancedb.com/images/icon-shapes.svg)
More than just embedding. Filter, select, and stream training data directly from object storage to keep GPU utilization high.
Advanced Retrieval
![icon](https://lancedb.com/images/icon-two-rings.svg)
Achieve high quality retrieval with hybrid vector and full text search with rich metadata filters and custom reranking.
Rich Ecosystem
![icon](https://lancedb.com/images/icon-dots.svg)
Fits into your existing toolchain for both data and AI. Ingest billions of vectors at the drop of a hat using Spark or Ray.
Powered by Lance Format
![icon](https://lancedb.com/images/icon-two-rects.svg)
Innovative new open source columnar format optimized for multimodal AI training, analytics, and retrieval. Up to 100x faster than parquet for many AI workloads.
Trusted by enterprises
Deployed at production-scale with the most challenging requirements across multimodal generative AI, autonomous vehicles, streaming, AI-enabled e-commerce, and much more
![](https://lancedb.com/images/soc2-t2-bw-transparent.png)
![](https://lancedb.com/images/hipaa-transparent.png)
LanceDB Cloud is SOC2 Type II and HIPAA certified.
LanceDB is a developer-friendly,open source database for Multimodal AI.
[Get Started![link-arrow](https://lancedb.com/images/link-arrow.svg)](https://lancedb.com/<https:/lancedb.github.io/lancedb/basic/>)

generated_description:
**LanceDB: Your Go-To Open-Source Vector Database for AI**

Founded in 2022 and part of Y Combinator Batch W22, LanceDB is a groundbreaking open-source vector database designed specifically for the needs of generative AI. Located in the bustling tech hub of San Francisco, this nimble company, with a team of just 10, focuses on making low-latency billion-scale vector searches a breeze‚Äîall on a single node.

### What's in the Name?

The mission at LanceDB is crystal clear: they aim to provide a serverless, open-source vector database that caters to production-level generative AI projects. The innovation behind LanceDB lies in its new columnar data format, which supercharges the development of various applications, from recommendation systems and search engines to content moderation tools.

### Performance that Speaks Volumes

LanceDB stands out for its impressive capabilities:
- **Ultra-fast Searches**: Perform real-time searches across billions of vectors‚Äîyes, even on a regular laptop. 
- **Cost-Effective Scalability**: Major companies are leveraging LanceDB to manage billions of vectors and a mountain of multimedia content‚Äîall without breaking the bank.
- **Advanced Retrieval Techniques**: This isn‚Äôt just about searching; it‚Äôs about quality. With hybrid vector and full text search, users can access rich metadata filters and custom ranking, enhancing the retrieval quality to meet diverse needs.

### A Rich Ecosystem 

LanceDB integrates seamlessly into existing AI and data toolchains, allowing users to ingest vast amounts of vectors using frameworks like Spark or Ray. It's optimized not just for search, but for multimodal training and analytics, making it a versatile option for developers. The database is also designed to easily scale down to zero when not in use, providing a flexible deployment model akin to SQLite.

### Building Trust 

LanceDB's reliability is backed by crucial certifications where its cloud service is SOC2 Type II and HIPAA compliant, making it a trustworthy choice for enterprises with stringent requirements in sectors like health tech and e-commerce.

### Noteworthy Collaborations 

Prominent companies, including Midjourney, have chosen LanceDB for its unparalleled performance in handling high-traffic workloads. Their success stories underline how LanceDB meets critical infrastructure needs effectively.

Now, if you‚Äôre on the lookout for an easier way to manage AI data‚Äîfrom the experimental stage to production‚Äîcheck out LanceDB. They make it simple to get started, and with a growing community and comprehensive documentation, you're not alone on this journey.

For more information, visit [LanceDB‚Äôs website](https://lancedb.com) and dive into the future of AI with a solid foundation that promises speed, efficiency, and scalability.
